author: The Film Theorists
description:
*🤫 Something new is coming soon…* ► https://www.theoryverse.store

Today, we’re finally covering another classic horror franchise…Scream! Everyone thought that our original Ghostface killer died in the first movie, however it’s been revealed that he may be returning for Scream 7. Which then begs the question…HOW is this possible? Was he hiding in the shadows this whole time…find out in today’s episode!
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

title: Film Theory: Scream’s Puppet Master FINALLY Unmasked…
